verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. How long wilt thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? how long wilt thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me?

How long shall I <S%H7896>take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, having <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3119>daily<s%>? how long shall mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> over me?
<S%H5027>Consider<s%> and <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H215>lighten<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, lest I <S%H3462>sleep<s%> the sleep of <S%H4194>death<s%>;
Lest mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, I have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against him; and those that <S%H6862>trouble<s%> me <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> when I am <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
But I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, because he hath dealt <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with me.
